entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF RAIN LATE THIS EVENING
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLOUDY
FREEZING RAIN AND SNOW SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 20S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 70 PERCENT

FREEZING RAIN
SNOW AND RAIN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
LIGHT SNOW ACCUMULATION
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 20S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
FREEZING RAIN AND SNOW SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
NEW LIGHT SNOW ACCUMULATION POSSIBLE
LOWS AROUND 20
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 20S
LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS 5 TO 10 ABOVE
HIGHS AROUND 20

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 20S
